comments.author: Assassachick

comments.text: Well, then what prevents you from joining us against them?
comments.author: unimpressiveavenger

comments.text: I am NOT in an Alliance couchville I only owe them
comments.author: Assassachick

comments.text:
+unimpressiveavenger​​ Same as us, war is not kind. Although I wish it does 
away. My kingdom always suffers the worst. We supply our allies. You know, 
the elves on the shelf have magic, we specialize in weapons. And for that 
people strike us, hard. I hardly have allies because of what happened. I'm 
only helping couchville because they helped me in my time of need. Now it's 
my turn. But one thing good will come out of it. The dwarves of the kitchen 
drawers are known thieves. They were allies once, they stole how we built 
our swords and they used it against us. them and the trolls of the oven are 
the ones that destroyed my kingdom. Both once allies. I seek to destroy 
both at least this war will help me do one thing with them.﻿ So, the 
weapons the dwarves gave the Ottoman Empire are sort of made by me
comments.author: Assassachick

comments.text:
+Assassachick while I agree with your sentiments, war is war. And while it 
pains me as king of the shelf elves to say this, war separates even kith 
and kin. Flesh and blood are still no match for the violence of war. We 
shelf elves take war very seriously.
comments.author: unimpressiveavenger

comments.text:
+unimpressiveavenger Well, when your villages are burned and your food is 
gone and many are injured or dead you become desperate and couchville help. 
They gave us food, shelter, and they helped our wounded and helped bury our 
dead. But does this silly war prevent our kingdoms from peace with each 
other?
comments.author: Assassachick

comments.text:
+Assassachick You have earned the respect of the shelf elves. While we 
revere you for your loyalty to your allies, I, as king of the shelf elves, 
fear that such commendable loyalty may have been misplaced in the 
treacherous Couchville swine.
comments.author: unimpressiveavenger

comments.text:
+unimpressiveavenger very honorable, I respect that. Couchville did the 
same for my kingdom. I just hate having to go against our own kin. We may 
be different, but we're still elves.
comments.author: Assassachick

comments.text:
+Assassachick Because, when the kingdom of the shelf elves was threatened 
by the evil hordes of the Indians in the cupboards, it was the Ottoman 
Empire who rescued us in our time of greatest need. Now, we are returning 
the favor.
comments.author: unimpressiveavenger

>>OFFER THEM THE IPHONE IF YOU HAVE TO.
